quote_first: The clock inlaid with mother-of-pearl, which would not run, stopped at some
quote_last: of a dead and forgotten day and time, which had been his mother's dowry.
quote_raw: The clock inlaid with mother-of-pearl, which would not run, stopped at some fourteen minutes past two o'clock of a dead and forgotten day and time, which had been his mother's dowry.
title: Barn Burning
author: William Faulkner
